name: @identity-base/react-organizations
description: React helpers for working with Identity.Base organization features.

scripts.test: npm --prefix ../identity-react-client run build && npm run build && node --test --loader ./test/loader.mjs test/*.test.mjs
scripts.coverage: npm --prefix ../identity-react-client run build && npm run build && c8 --check-coverage --lines 30 --functions 20 --branches 40 --reporter=text --reporter=lcov node --test --loader ./test/loader.mjs test/*.test.mjs
